channel.title: Cassandra on Yougg's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cassandra on Yougg's Blog

item.title: 使用Cassandra
item.description: Golang访问Cassandra的客户端gocql 事务支持 INSERT INTO tablex (column_a, column_b, column_c) VALUES ('a','b','c') IF NOT EXISTS; UPDATE tablex SET column_a = 'x', column_b = 'y', column_c = 'z' WHERE column_a = 'a' IF column_a = 'a'; SQL语句转义 var replacer
